meanings.definition: Straggliest: superlative form of straggly, meaning having straggling or untidy growth
meanings.sent1: The bushes in the garden were the straggliest, with branches sticking out in all directions.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was the straggliest in the class, always looking messy and unkempt.
meanings.sent3: The straggliest tree in the forest seemed to have a mind of its own, growing in odd angles.
meanings.sent4: The straggliest vines in the jungle intertwined like a chaotic dance of nature.
meanings.sent5: The straggliest weeds in the yard stubbornly resisted all attempts at neatness.

meanings.definition: Straggliest: superlative form of straggly, meaning dispersed or scattered in a disorderly way
meanings.sent1: The straggliest group of birds flew in all directions, unable to stay together.
meanings.sent2: The straggliest clouds in the sky looked like they were lost and wandering aimlessly.
meanings.sent3: The straggliest pieces of confetti at the party seemed to have a mind of their own, floating in different directions.
meanings.sent4: The straggliest thoughts in her mind were like scattered puzzle pieces waiting to be put together.
meanings.sent5: The straggliest leaves on the ground painted a picture of chaos in the autumn breeze.
